    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>scholaris</catalog>
            <entry>061129_090712_121</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fractions (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brüche (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractions (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frações (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frazioni (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη (1)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fracciones (1)</string>
          </title>
          <language>pl</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">What is a fraction? different types of fractions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">a fraction as a result of division</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equivalent fractions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">an irreducible form of a fraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist ein Bruch? unterschiedliche Typen 
der Brüche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ein Bruch resultierend aus Abteilung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gleichwertige Brüche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ein nicht reduzierbares Formular eines Bruches</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est une fraction ? différents types
de fractions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">une fraction en raison de division</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fractions équivalentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">une forme irréductible d'une fraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é uma fração? tipos diferentes de

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma fração em conseqüência da divisão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frações equivalentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">um formulário irreducible de uma fração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è una frazione? tipi differenti 
di frazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">una frazione come conseguenza di divisione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">frazioni equivalenti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">una forma irriducibile di una frazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι είναι ένα μέρος; διαφορετικοί τύποι μερών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ένα μέρος ως αποτέλεσμα του τμήματος</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μια αμείωτη μορφή ενός μέρους</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fracciones equivalentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">una forma irreducible de una fracción</string>
          </keyword>
